error-messages.msg: Expecting one of the following tokens: ##token
Procedure '##name' is called as a function
Parameter mismatch; '##name' requires argument on parameter ##parm
Too many arguments on call to '##name'
Too less arguments on call to '##name'
Compile-time function '##name' is called with variable arguments
'CONT' is used in an illegal context
'BREAK' is used in an illegal context
System variable '##var' can't be accessed as an array
Constant '##var' can't be accessed as an array
Label '##label' is already defined in this scope
Label '##label' is not defined or reachable
